title: Precipitation
description: Describes the visuals for a biome's precipitation. Biomes without this component will have default values. At most one precipitation type can be set for a biome.

blue_spores.title: Blue Spores
blue_spores.description: Density of blue spore precipitation visuals.

red_spores.title: Red Spores
red_spores.description: Density of blue spore precipitation visuals.

white_ash.title: White Ash
white_ash.description: Density of white ash precipitation visuals.
